dct_description_sm: Map of South Africa showing open railway lines, proposed railway lines, open telegraph lines, roads, towns and rivers.
"Issued by the publishers of the South African Travellers' Guide, 84_ Loop Street, Capetown."
Bar scale on map given in "Eng. Statute Miles."

11 pictorial insets: [John Hanning] Speke; Bloemfontein; Pretoria; Market Square, Kimberley; Cape Town; [Henry Morton] Stanley; Port Elizabeth; Entrance to Buffalo River, East London; Durban, Natal; portion of Victoria Falls on the river Zambesi; [David] Livingstone.
dct_publisher_sm: Issued by the Publishers of the South African Travellers' Guide, 84 1/2 Loop Street
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
